title: BRIEF-Macay Holdings Clarifies On Potential Acquisition Announced By Alfredo Yao
text:
BRIEF-Macay Holdings Clarifies On Potential Acquisition Announced By Alfredo Yao

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 13:08)

BRIEF-Macay Holdings Clarifies On Potential Acquisition Announced By Alfredo Yao Oct 17 (Reuters) - Macay Holdings Inc :

* CLARIFIES POTENTIAL ACQUISITION IN NEWS ARTICLE MAY BE

RELATED

TO ALFREDO YAO'S OTHER BUSINESSES SUCH AS ZESTO



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX7vx72W

Further company coverage: MACAY.PS
